review: He is very good and kind...my brother was admitted in bildroth for diabetics and liver problem..now he is alright...he is giving a another birth to my brother

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I know Dr CR for more than 15 years. When ever we face health issues regularly visit him for consultation. Especially his treatment to my son Balaji who got affected with dengue fever was so tremendous.After diagnosing the disease and getting him admitted and so on. He got cured with the Dr's personal care. 
Hats off Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was admitted in the hospital for 4days due to dengue fever..
Day by day my platelets counts was getting decreased..
Apart from treatment the doctors approach gave me positive energy and I got recovered.
My special thanks to DR C Rajendran sir.

I Visited Billroth Hospital Where located near AMINJIKARAI. I consulted Dr. Rajendran (General Physician). His Explanation  About My Health was Good. And also  attending Patient Was Very Kind and Gentle. A proper Response for Patient who Consults him Thank You Dr.
My daughter who is studing 2nd year MBBS  affected by dengue.  Dr. C.Rajandiran cured her in 4 days.  He is good in diagnosing and good humanbeing

review: One of my friend referred him. Firstly he gave confidence to my mother and made her to come out of the fear. Now she is feeling better and happy also.
he is very sincere to his work :) the way he is handling to convey about the disease to his patient is different(much appreciated)..
